channel.title: Algorithms on Mailund on the Internet
channel.description: Recent content in Algorithms on Mailund on the Internet

item.title: Prefix Doubling Attempts
item.description: I’ve been working on an algorithm for suffix array construction today. It’s called prefix doubling, but I don’t have a link, sorry. I think it comes from this paper but I don’t have access to it at home.

item.title: 'Witness' arrays
item.description: The other day I was reminded of an exercises we got first or second year when I studied computer science. It is a cool little trick, that I’ve never seen outside of that exercise, so I thought I’d share it.
